46 template <typename ARROW_TYPE, typename Enable = void>
47 class StringConverter;
48 
49 template <>
50 class StringConverter<BooleanType> {
51  public:
52  using value_type = bool;
53 
54  bool operator()(const char* s, size_t length, value_type* out) {
55  if (length == 1) {
56  // "0" or "1"?
57  if (s[0] == '0') {
58  *out = false;
59  return true;
60  }
61  if (s[0] == '1') {
62  *out = true;
63  return true;
64  }
65  return false;
66  }
67  if (length == 4) {
68  // "true"?
69  *out = true;
70  return ((s[0] == 't' || s[0] == 'T') && (s[1] == 'r' || s[1] == 'R') &&
71  (s[2] == 'u' || s[2] == 'U') && (s[3] == 'e' || s[3] == 'E'));
72  }
73  if (length == 5) {
74  // "false"?
75  *out = false;
76  return ((s[0] == 'f' || s[0] == 'F') && (s[1] == 'a' || s[1] == 'A') &&
77  (s[2] == 'l' || s[2] == 'L') && (s[3] == 's' || s[3] == 'S') &&
78  (s[4] == 'e' || s[4] == 'E'));
79  }
80  return false;
81  }
82 };
83 
84 // Ideas for faster float parsing:
85 // - http://rapidjson.org/md_doc_internals.html#ParsingDouble
86 // - https://github.com/google/double-conversion [used here]
87 // - https://github.com/achan001/dtoa-fast
88 
89 template <class ARROW_TYPE>
90 class StringToFloatConverterMixin {
91  public:
92  using value_type = typename ARROW_TYPE::c_type;
93 
94  StringToFloatConverterMixin()
95  : main_converter_(flags_, main_junk_value_, main_junk_value_, "inf", "nan"),
96  fallback_converter_(flags_, fallback_junk_value_, fallback_junk_value_, "inf",
97  "nan") {}
98 
99  bool operator()(const char* s, size_t length, value_type* out) {
100  value_type v;
101  // double-conversion doesn't give us an error flag but signals parse
102  // errors with sentinel values. Since a sentinel value can appear as
103  // legitimate input, we fallback on a second converter with a different
104  // sentinel to eliminate false errors.
105  TryConvert(main_converter_, s, length, &v);
106  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(v == static_cast<value_type>(main_junk_value_))) {
107  TryConvert(fallback_converter_, s, length, &v);
108  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(v == static_cast<value_type>(fallback_junk_value_))) {
109  return false;
110  }
111  }
112  *out = v;
113  return true;
114  }
115 
116  protected:
117  static const int flags_ =
118  double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter::ALLOW_CASE_INSENSIBILITY;
119  // Two unlikely values to signal a parsing error
120  static constexpr double main_junk_value_ = 0.7066424364107089;
121  static constexpr double fallback_junk_value_ = 0.40088499148279166;
122 
123  double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter main_converter_;
124  double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter fallback_converter_;
125 
126  inline void TryConvert(double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter& converter,
127  const char* s, size_t length, float* out) {
128  int processed_length;
129  *out = converter.StringToFloat(s, static_cast<int>(length), &processed_length);
130  }
131 
132  inline void TryConvert(double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter& converter,
133  const char* s, size_t length, double* out) {
134  int processed_length;
135  *out = converter.StringToDouble(s, static_cast<int>(length), &processed_length);
136  }
137 };
138 
139 template <>
140 class StringConverter<FloatType> : public StringToFloatConverterMixin<FloatType> {};
141 
142 template <>
143 class StringConverter<DoubleType> : public StringToFloatConverterMixin<DoubleType> {};

147 namespace detail {
148 
149 #define PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(C_TYPE) \
150  if (length > 0) { \
151  uint8_t digit = static_cast<uint8_t>(*s++ - '0'); \
152  result = static_cast<C_TYPE>(result * 10U); \
153  length--; \
154  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(digit > 9U)) { \
155  /* Non-digit */ \
156  return false; \
157  } \
158  result = static_cast<C_TYPE>(result + digit); \
159  }
160 
161 #define PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION_LAST(C_TYPE) \
162  if (length > 0) { \
163  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(result > std::numeric_limits<C_TYPE>::max() / 10U)) { \
164  /* Overflow */ \
165  return false; \
166  } \
167  uint8_t digit = static_cast<uint8_t>(*s++ - '0'); \
168  result = static_cast<C_TYPE>(result * 10U); \
169  C_TYPE new_result = static_cast<C_TYPE>(result + digit); \
170  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(--length > 0)) { \
171  /* Too many digits */ \
172  return false; \
173  } \
174  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(digit > 9U)) { \
175  /* Non-digit */ \
176  return false; \
177  } \
178  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(new_result < result)) { \
179  /* Overflow */ \
180  return false; \
181  } \
182  result = new_result; \
183  }
184 
185 inline bool ParseUnsigned(const char* s, size_t length, uint8_t* out) {
186  uint8_t result = 0;
187 
188  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint8_t);
189  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint8_t);
190  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION_LAST(uint8_t);
191  *out = result;
192  return true;
193 }
194 
195 inline bool ParseUnsigned(const char* s, size_t length, uint16_t* out) {
196  uint16_t result = 0;
197 
198  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint16_t);
199  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint16_t);
200  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint16_t);
201  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint16_t);
202  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION_LAST(uint16_t);
203  *out = result;
204  return true;
205 }

226 inline bool ParseUnsigned(const char* s, size_t length, uint64_t* out) {
227  uint64_t result = 0;
228 
229  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
230  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
231  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);

241  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
242  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
243  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
244  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
245  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);
246 
247  PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION(uint64_t);

253  *out = result;
254  return true;
255 }

257 #undef PARSE_UNSIGNED_ITERATION

262 template <class ARROW_TYPE>
263 class StringToUnsignedIntConverterMixin {
264  public:
265  using value_type = typename ARROW_TYPE::c_type;
266 
267  bool operator()(const char* s, size_t length, value_type* out) {
268  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(length == 0)) {
269  return false;
270  }
271  // Skip leading zeros
272  while (length > 0 && *s == '0') {
273  length--;
274  s++;
275  }
276  return detail::ParseUnsigned(s, length, out);
277  }
278 };
279

281 class StringConverter<UInt8Type> : public StringToUnsignedIntConverterMixin<UInt8Type> {};

295 template <class ARROW_TYPE>
296 class StringToSignedIntConverterMixin {
297  public:
298  using value_type = typename ARROW_TYPE::c_type;
299  using unsigned_type = typename std::make_unsigned<value_type>::type;
300 
301  bool operator()(const char* s, size_t length, value_type* out) {
302  static constexpr unsigned_type max_positive =
303  static_cast<unsigned_type>(std::numeric_limits<value_type>::max());
304  // Assuming two's complement
305  static constexpr unsigned_type max_negative = max_positive + 1;
306  bool negative = false;
307  unsigned_type unsigned_value = 0;
308 
309  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(length == 0)) {
310  return false;
311  }
312  if (*s == '-') {
313  negative = true;
314  s++;
315  if (--length == 0) {
316  return false;
317  }
318  }
319  // Skip leading zeros
320  while (length > 0 && *s == '0') {
321  length--;
322  s++;
323  }
324  if (!ARROW_PREDICT_TRUE(detail::ParseUnsigned(s, length, &unsigned_value))) {
325  return false;
326  }
327  if (negative) {
328  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(unsigned_value > max_negative)) {
329  return false;
330  }
331  *out = static_cast<value_type>(-static_cast<value_type>(unsigned_value));
332  } else {
333  if (ARROW_PREDICT_FALSE(unsigned_value > max_positive)) {
334  return false;
335  }
336  *out = static_cast<value_type>(unsigned_value);
337  }
338  return true;
339  }
340 };
341 
342 template <>
343 class StringConverter<Int8Type> : public StringToSignedIntConverterMixin<Int8Type> {};
